title: Amazon Haul Offer: Extra 40% off Clearance + Possible $10 off $25 Coupon!
description: Wow! Don’t miss this rare Amazon Haul offer! Woohoo! Right now, you can score an extra 40% off select clearance Amazon Haul purchase! Just open the Amazon app on your phone and search “haul”. Add items to your cart (tons to choose from!) from the clearance page here and the discount will come off automaticallyRead More
author: Gretchen
